Episodes.Title: There's Only One Way To Try A Case
Episodes.Plot: Ellen investigates Howard Erickson's company despite warnings from her boss and from Patty; Patty takes on a big pharmaceutical firm; Erickson goes after defense contracts for his company.
Episodes.Writer: Todd A. Kessler, Glenn Kessler, Daniel Zelman

Episodes.Title: I've Done Way Too Much For This Girl
Episodes.Plot: Ellen takes the High Star case to the senior partners; Chris feels certain he is being targeted; Erickson and Boorman try to make the lawsuit go away.

Episodes.Title: I'd Prefer My Old Office
Episodes.Plot: Ellen learns that Chris used to hunt down terror suspects; Patty rejects Erickson's settlement suggestion for the High Star case.

Episodes.Title: Next One's On Me, Blondie
Episodes.Plot: Ellen meets the son of Chris' Afghan contact; Erickson decides to torture Chris for information about the possibility of an intelligence breach; Patty discovers that High Star extracts terror suspects for the CIA.

Episodes.Title: We'll Just Have To Find Another Way To Cut The Balls Off Of This Thing
Episodes.Plot: Ellen and Patty move Nasim to a safer place as they gather evidence against High Star; Boorman frames Nasim for an attempted bombing to prevent his deposition; Erickson struggles to maintain his CIA contact.

Episodes.Title: Add That Little Hopper To Your Stew
Episodes.Plot: Now that Nasim is labeled as a terrorist, he loses his credibility as a witness. Erickson buys land to build a private army. Ellen enlists journalist Dean Gulickson to track down Chris in Afghanistan. Michael comes to see Patty and demands to meet Catherine.

Episodes.Title: I'm Worried About My Dog
Episodes.Plot: Patty uses her drug-company case to gain information on High Star; and a journalist tries to embed with High Star mercenaries in Afghanistan. Meanwhile, Michael Hewes seeks out his daughter, Catherine.

Episodes.Title: The War Will Go On Forever
Episodes.Plot: While reporter Dean Gullickson (Griffin Dunne) heads to Afghanistan, Erickson orders his staff there to deal with Sanchez once and for all. He also confronts Boorman. Meanwhile, the judge in the High Star case allows Ellen to depose Erickson. "Just remember that we're in the middle of a game," Patty tells her. "We don't have to win it now. We just want to keep playing."
Episodes.Writer: Todd A. Kessler, Glenn Kessler, Daniel Zelman

Episodes.Title: There's A Whole Slew Of Ladies
Episodes.Plot: Boorman tries to align himself with Patty. Meanwhile, Chris' life remains in jeopardy and the case becomes personal for Erickson.
Episodes.Writer: Todd A. Kessler, Glenn Kessler, Daniel Zelman

Episodes.Title: Failure Is Lonely
Episodes.Plot: Ellen is furious with Patty for violating their agreement about the High Star case. And tempers come to a head between Erickson and Boorman?with Chris' life hanging in the balance.
Episodes.Writer: Todd A. Kessler, Glenn Kessler, Daniel Zelman
